name: Farm Together: Polar Pack
summary: Farm Together: Polar Pack has all new flowers: Euphorbia (3 variants), new tree: Holly Tree. As well as a new building: Smoked Fish Stand, new decorations: Curling Stone, Curling Target, Wooden Hot Tub, Icy Path, Sled and even new items; fence: Slalom Gate new outfits with four different skins and new hairstyles.
